materials.washing_method: washed three times with DMF, then exchanged with methanol over three days
materials.additional_information: The mixture was heated to 115 °C over one hour before holding for 48 h, then cooled to room temperature.
The representative crystal structure for Y and YbNd-based compounds was previously detailed elsewhere.

materials.equipment: Bruker D8 Venture dual-source single crystal X-ray diffractometer
materials.additional_information: Empirical formula: C204 Eu18 O93.26, Formula weight: 6677.48, Crystal system: Hexagonal P 63/m m c, Unit cell dimensions: a = 22.0812(3) Å, b = 22.0812(3) Å, c = 25.2784(7) Å, Volume: 10674.0(4) Å3, Z: 1, Calculated density: 1.039 g/cm3, F(000): 3104.0, Crystal size: 0.34 x 0.18 x 0.12 mm, Theta range for data collection: 2.310 to 55.970°, Reflections collected / unique: 2600/2377, R indices: R1 = 0.1353, wR2 = 0.3167, Largest diff. peak and hole: -4.752 to 6.088 eÅ-3.
